```py
t1=time.time()
for item in l1:
    l2.append(lg10(item))
t2 = time.time()
print("With for loop and appending it took {} seconds".format(t2-t1))
speed.append(t2-t1)
```

```py
t1=time.time()
a2=np.log10(a1)
t2 = time.time()
print("With direct Numpy log10 method it took {} seconds".format(t2-t1))
speed.append(t2-t1)
```
